loan.name: Tsetsegmaa
loan.use: to buy various vegetables and pickled vegetables.
loan.description:
Tsetsegmaa is an experienced, self-employed entrepreneur. She's 66 years old and lives in the city center with her husband. She's a good communicator dealing with the public. She didn't want to sit back at home after retirement, so she started her own business.

She was interested in agriculture, so Tsetsegmaa decided to grow vegetables to sell herself. She has a vegetable stand in a large shopping mall. Since it's been more than a decade since she started this business, she's attracted a lot of regular customers. More than 15 people visit each day. They're very happy because they're buying organic vegetables grown in healthy soil.

She's very happy to have started her own business because she's been able to increase her income and work flexible hours. Her husband supports her a lot.

She requested a loan to expand her business. She'll use it to buy various vegetables and pickled vegetables. Tsetsegmaa is working diligently every day to further expand her business.
loan.whySpecial: This loan will support the creation of new businesses and self-employment in poor communities.
